name: 超粗字体主题
description: 极致粗壮的字体设计，注意力经济时代的视觉语言，炫酷而优雅的排版美学
author: FlowEdit Team

inlineStyles.strong: font-weight: 900; color: #1a1a1a; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b6b 0%, #ee5a52 100%); padding: 0.15em 0.4em; font-size: 1.02em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; border-radius: 6px; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(238, 90, 82, 0.3);
inlineStyles.b: font-weight: 900; color: #1a1a1a; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b6b 0%, #ee5a52 100%); padding: 0.15em 0.4em; font-size: 1.02em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; border-radius: 6px; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(238, 90, 82, 0.3);
inlineStyles.em: font-style: normal; font-weight: 800; color: #ffffff; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4ecdc4 0%, #44a08d 100%); padding: 0.1em 0.3em; font-size: 1.01em; letter-spacing: 0.03em; border-radius: 4px; box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(68, 160, 141, 0.25);
inlineStyles.i: font-style: normal; font-weight: 800; color: #ffffff; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4ecdc4 0%, #44a08d 100%); padding: 0.1em 0.3em; font-size: 1.01em; letter-spacing: 0.03em; border-radius: 4px; box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(68, 160, 141, 0.25);
inlineStyles.u: text-decoration: none; font-weight: 800; color: #1a1a1a; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd93d 0%, #ff6b6b 100%); background-size: 100% 0.2em; background-position: 0 85%; background-repeat: no-repeat; padding-bottom: 0.1em; letter-spacing: 0.02em;
inlineStyles.code: font-family: 'SF Mono', 'Monaco', 'Menlo', monospace; font-size: 0.95em; font-weight: 700; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #2c3e50 0%, #34495e 100%); color: #ecf0f1; padding: 0.25em 0.5em; border-radius: 8px; letter-spacing: 0.05em; box-shadow: 0 3px 12px rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.3);
inlineStyles.mark: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd93d 0%, #ffad3d 100%); color: #1a1a1a; padding: 0.15em 0.35em; font-weight: 800; border-radius: 6px; letter-spacing: 0.02em; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(255, 173, 61, 0.3);
inlineStyles.a: color: #667eea; text-decoration: none; font-weight: 800; background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.1) 0%, rgba(118, 75, 162, 0.1) 100%); padding: 0.1em 0.25em; border-radius: 4px; letter-spacing: 0.01em; border-bottom: 2px solid #667eea;
inlineStyles.sup: color: #666666; font-size: 0.7em; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: super; background: #f8f9fa; padding: 0.1em 0.2em; border-radius: 3px;

globalStyles.container: <section style='max-width: 100%; margin: 0 auto; padding: 1.6em; font-size: 17px; line-height: 1.45; color: #1a1a1a; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif; font-weight: 600; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); background-attachment: fixed; position: relative;'><section style='background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.92); border-radius: 16px; padding: 2em; box-shadow: 0 15px 45px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08); backdrop-filter: blur(15px);'>{{content}}</section></section>
